Refers to the T-Bar at a given station. Three are always deployed. Number indicates the order they were processed.

Position on the stringer from 1 (top) to 6 (bottom). Numbering is continuous, so the second stringer on the T continues 7 (top) to 12 (bottom). We only process the underside of the middle 4 shells on each stringer.
